text: sǣma ātmayak kerehima ovun ipæyū dǣ piḷiban̆da va ohu nirīkṣā karanneku va siṭiya dī ovuhu allāhṭa havulkaruvan pat kaḷō da? (nabivaraya,) ovuhu ovun nam kaḷō da nætahot mahapoḷovē ohu nodannā dǣ ohuṭa ovun danvannē da nætahot eya matupiṭin pavatina prakāśayak da? namut pratikṣēpa kaḷavunaṭa ovungē kumantraṇaya alaṁkāravat karana ladī. tavada yaha magin ovun vaḷakvana ladī. tavada kavurunva allāh nomaga yavannē da eviṭa kisidu maga penvanneku ohuṭa nomæta
